vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A king of Amorites living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Num.21.21
§ Sihon = "warrior"
king of the Amorites at the time of the conquest and defeated by Moses in Transjordan
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
西宏 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "勇士"
征服時期被摩西在外約旦所擊敗的亞摩利王
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
西宏 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "勇士"
征服时期被摩西在外约旦所击败的亚摩利王
